item.title: Egoo EV Charger S Series
item.description: Experience effortless, stylish charging with our smart station, featuring RFID card start, sleek design, customizable colors, smart mobile App integration, LCD display, and seamless Tesla compatibility.

item.title: Egoo EV Charger E Series
item.description: Support RFID card charging with stylish design, customizable colors, water-themed lighting, smart features via mobile app, and an LCD display screen.

item.title: Egoo EV Charger C Series
item.description: Support RFID card charging, stylish design with water-themed lighting for a perfect visual experience, intelligent features including remote booking via mobile app and OTA upgrades, and customizable colors.

item.title: This Is How Much EV Charging The U.S. Will Need By 2030
item.description: The number of charging ports is expected to quickly increase, to support 33 million plug-ins.

item.title: House garage AC EV Charger Project at tailand bangkok area

item.title: Community garage AC Charger Project at china shenzhen area
item.description: Community garage AC Charger Project at china shenzhen area

Key Features: Portable Design: It’s small and lightweight, easy to carry around for on-the-go charging of your electric scooter. Versatile Charging: Works with multiple electric scooter models, so it’s suitable for different brands and types of scooters. Smart Charging Protection: Comes with built-in smart chips for protection against overcharging, overcurrent, overvoltage, and short circuits, ensuring safe charging. High Efficiency: It’s energy-efficient with fast charging speed, helping you save energy while charging up quickly.

How to charge Level 1: Standardized connector. At home using a normal wall outlet; cable included with car. Slow charge rate; 3-5 miles per hour. Useful for drivers travelling 40 miles or less daily; level 2 preferred if available. Level 2: Standardized connector. At home using a dedicated charging station. Medium charge rate; 15-30 miles per hour. Useful for drivers traveling 100+ miles daily. DC fast charging: Three connector types; CCS, CHAdeMO, Tesla.

Parameter EV16A01CN | EV32A01CN Model No EV16A01CN | EV32A01CN Adjustable Current 16A(8/10/13/16A) | 32A(16/20/24/32A) Power 3.5kw | 7kw Cable Specification 32.5mm+10.75mm | 36mm + 10.75mm Voltage 220V User Interface LED indicator + LCD display(2.4inch) Standard GB/T18487.1-2015 GB/T20234 GB/T 33594 Charging connector GB/T Plug +5M cable | custom cable length & color Product Dimensions EV plug: 2306554 mm Control Box: 21810060mm Ingress Protection Charging plug: 1P65 Control box: IP65 Environmental Temperature -35°C to 55°C Case Material Thermoplastic (flame retardant grade UL94-0) Ground Fault Detection 30mA for AC faults (Type A) | 30mA for AC and 6mA for DC faults (Type A + 6) Product Performance Over voltage protection.

Parameter EV16A01US | EV32A01US | EV40A01US Model No EV16A01US | EV32A01US | EV40A01US Adjustable Current 16A(8/10/13/16A) | 32A(16/20/24/32A) | 40A (16/20/24/32/40 A) Power 3.5kw | 7kw | 9.6 KW Cable Specification 314AWG+118AWG TPE OD:14.2 mm | 310AWG+118AWG TPE OD:16.5 mm | 29AWG+110AWG+1*18AWG TPE OD:16.5 mm & emsp; Voltage 110V - 250V User Interface LED indicator+LCD display(2.4 inch) Standard SAE J1772 UL2594 UL62 Charging connector SAE J1772 Plug +5M cable | custom cable length & color Product Dimensions EV plug: 2206564mm Control Box: 21810060mm Ingress Protection Charging plug: 1P65 Control box: IP65 Environmental Temperature -35°C to 55°C Case Material Thermoplastic (flame retardant grade UL94-0) Ground Fault Detection 30mA for AC faults (Type A) | 30mA for AC and 6mA for DC faults (Type A + 6) Product Performance Over voltage protection.

Parameter EV13A01EU | EV16A01EU | EV32A01EU Model No EV13A01EU | EV16A01EU | EV32A01EU Adjustable Current 13A (6/8/10/13A) | 16A (8/10/13/16A) | 32A (16/20/24/ 32A) Power 2.9 KW | 3.5 KW | 7 KW Cable Specification 32.5mm+10.5mm TPU OD :10.8 mm | 32.5mm+10.5mm TPU OD:10. 8 mm | 36mm+10.5mm TPU OD:13.5 mm Voltage 220V-250V User Interface LED indicator+LCD display(2.4 inch) Standard EN62752 EN62196-281 EN50620 Charging connector Type 2 Plug +5M cable | custom cable length & color Product Dimensions EV plug: 2106962 mm Control Box: 21810060mm Ingress Protection Charging plug: 1P65 Control box: IP65 Environmental Temperature -35°C to 55°C Case Material Thermoplastic (flame retardant grade UL94-0) Ground Fault Detection 30mA for AC faults (Type A) | 30mA for AC and 6mA for DC faults (Type A + 6) Product Performance Over voltage protection.
